column4: i've got a question, I installed ubuntu amongside windows, and I wanted to install it on a certain partition, but on the install i didn't selected custom install and it installed without asking anything.Now the problem is I don't know where does ubuntu was installed, i mean on what partition.The partition I wanted ubuntu to be installed was in fact unpartitionned.
yes, but it only shows sda5 sda6 etc... how do I know from windows on what partition is in fact , like D:\ or E:\
yes, it works on dual boot
